cards.front: What is the Spanish alphabet?
cards.back: The Spanish alphabet consists of 27 letters: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, Ñ, O, P, Q, R, S, T, U, V, W, X, Y, Z.
